author: Suburban Trends
title: Independent candidate for council in Butler - Politics
text:
Independent candidate in Butler 
Dear Editor:
I am on the ballot this Nov. 3 in Butler as an independent candidate for Borough Council.
I have lived in Butler for 25 years and have been on Tri-Boro First Aid Squad for 10 years. I would like to encourage more people to volunteer for the many organizations in town and I will support all volunteers, especially the Fire Department, in their dealings with the council.
I teach an engineering class one night per week at County College of Morris and would like to encourage more young people to consider an engineering education and perhaps CCM as an option after high school. 
I deal with people in a courteous and professional manner and would continue that on the council. I would like to invite all Butler voters to take a look at my website www.gerry4councilman.com to learn more.
Gerry O'Halloran, PE, 
Butler
